RPG 3D Multiplayer Game.shortDescription: A feature-rich RPG game with an immersive open-world experience, multiplayer support, and a dynamic trading system.
RPG 3D Multiplayer Game.description: "RPG 3D Multiplayer" is an open-world role-playing game where players can explore vast landscapes, complete quests, engage in combat, and interact with other players in real-time. The game features a detailed inventory system, a dynamic market for trading items, and challenging AI-controlled enemies. Players can also join dungeons, battle powerful bosses, and upgrade their skills for a more immersive gameplay experience. Built with Unity and utilizing Netcode for GameObjects (NGO), Firebase, and AI-driven behaviors, this game delivers a smooth and engaging multiplayer experience.
features: Seamless open-world exploration with interactive NPCs
Real-time multiplayer system with smooth player synchronization
Challenging AI enemies using FSM for realistic behavior
Optimized performance with LOD, Object Pooling, and Async Scene Loading
Firebase integration for real-time data synchronization and authentication
Network Culling for efficient multiplayer interactions

3D Survivor Game.shortDescription: An open-world urvival game with dynamic experiences, crafting system, and resource management.
3D Survivor Game.description: "3D Survivor" is an immersive open-world survival game where players must gather resources, craft tools, and build shelters to survive in a hostile environment. The game features a dynamic weather system, day/night cycle, and challenging AI enemies. Players can team up or compete with others in real-time, engage in PvP combat, and explore vast procedurally generated landscapes filled with secrets and dangers. Core mechanics include hunger, thirst, and temperature management systems that create authentic survival challenges. Built with Unity and utilizing Netcode for GameObjects (NGO), Firebase, and intelligent AI, the game delivers a smooth and engaging multiplayer survival experience with robust crafting and base-building features.
features: Procedurally generated open world with dynamic environments
Challenging AI enemies with FSM for realistic behavior
Dynamic weather system and day/night cycle
Survival mechanics including hunger, thirst and temperature management

2D Multiplayer Game.shortDescription: A role-playing game featuring multiplayer support and an enjoyable shooting system.

The game features a detailed item system and a dynamic trading market. Players can participate in battles with other players for the most authentic gaming experience. Built with Unity and utilizing Netcode for GameObjects (NGO), Firebase, and intelligent AI, the game delivers a smooth and engaging multiplayer experience.
